data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As Dumbledore's shade admits later to having expected, Harry becomes infatuated, as did the youthful Dumbledore, with the Hallows. Like Dumbledore, Harry sees ____ as a means ____ regain ____ lost ____; ____, ____ believes ____ to ____ a ____ against Voldemort's expected ____ attack. The Hallows ' ____ remains ____ until ____ Harry ____ Malfoy Manor. Following that, Harry will choose to only seek and destroy Horcruxes, though that decision will torment him, particularly after he learns that Voldemort has claimed the Elder Wand.
data.partBlankContent: As Dumbledore's shade admits later to having expected, Harry becomes infatuated, as did the youthful Dumbledore, with the Hallows. Like Dumbledore, Harry sees th__ as a means t_ regain h__ lost fam___; additi______, h_ believes th__ to b_ a safe_____ against Voldemort's expected murd_____ attack. Following that, Harry will choose to only seek and destroy Horcruxes, though that decision will torment him, particularly after he learns that Voldemort has claimed the Elder Wand.
data.answer: 正如邓布利多的影子后来承认的那样，哈利和年轻时的邓布利多一样，对圣器着迷了。和邓布利多一样，哈利把它们看作是找回失去的家庭的一种方式;此外，他相信它们是抵御伏地魔预期中的凶残袭击的一种保护。圣器的吸引力仍然很强，直到哈利逃离马尔福庄园。在此之后，哈利将选择只寻找并摧毁魂器，尽管这个决定会让他感到痛苦，尤其是在他得知伏地魔已经拿走了老魔杖之后。
